arts.ttl: Why Ousmane Dembele Takes Penalties With His Weak Foot
arts.sum: PSG and France star Ousmane Dembele explained why he opts to take penalties with his weaker right foot

arts.ttl: 'Wasted': Arne Slot told he made one costly mistake that didn't help Liverpool vs PSG at all
All-action Vitinha embodies new PSG as Luis Enrique shifts the culture | Jonathan Liew
arts.sum: The PSG midfielder covered every blade of grass at Anfield as his side frustrated Liverpool for 120 minutes Afterwards, they carried on running. They had run for two hours, run themselves into the ground, run themselves delirious, but at the moment of triumph the players of Paris Saint-Germain somehow managed to find a few more yards in them. Ran towards their fans in the corner, ran in wild circles, tore across the Anfield grass as if it were the Champs-Ã‰lysÃ©es. One man did not run. As DÃ©sirÃ© DouÃ©â€™s penalty hit the net, Vitinha simply crumpled, his legs finally giving way, his last drop of energy exhausted. Eventually, with his teammates still celebrating 70 yards away, he hauled himself to his feet and was the first to commiserate with Liverpoolâ€™s beaten players. Then, after they had dispersed, he simply stood in the centre circle for a few moments, as if finally claiming the turf for which he had spent the whole night fighting. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: PSG boss Luis Enrique dismisses Liverpool theory and makes Champions League vow
arts.sum: Luis Enrique masterminded Paris Saint-Germain's Champions League victory over Liverpool, beating the Arne Slot's men on the so-called 'lottery' of penalties to book their place in the quarter-finals

arts.ttl: Virgil van Dijk spotted in discussion with PSG chiefs after Liverpool Champions League exit
arts.sum: Liverpool were dumped out of the Champions League after losing on penalties to Paris Saint-Germain, who'd levelled the round-of-16 second leg by winning in normal time at Anfield

arts.ttl: Liverpool: Trent Alexander-Arnold and Ibrahima Konate injury updates revealed before Carabao Cup final
arts.sum: Both Reds defenders went off hurt during agonising Champions League defeat by PSG with Newcastle clash at Wembley looming

arts.ttl: Liverpool beaten on penalties as Paris St Germain progress in Champions League
